sec.p: The following reagents were used to evaluate the antioxidant activity: methanol (Lobachemie, India), n-hexane (Frutarom LTD, Haifa), Trolox ((s)-(âˆ’)-6 hydroxy-2,5,7,8-tetramethychroman-2-carboxylic acid) (Sigma-Aldrich, Denmark), and (DPPH) 2,2-Diphenyl-1-picrylhydrazyl (Sigma-Aldrich, Germany).

Reagents used for the screening of the antimicrobial activity of T. bovei volatile oil included nutrient broth that was ordered from Himedia, India, and Dimethyl sulfoxide (DMSO), which was purchased from Riedeldehan, Germany.
While ethanol (Lobachemie, India) and piperazine citrate (Sigma-Aldrich, Denmark) were the used reagents for the anthelmintic assay.
